![](https://baystreet.ca/images/trackingimage.gif?articleid=118085)

![Sanctions Squeeze Iran’s Oil Revenues Despite Higher Output.](https://baystreet.ca/images/articlegroups/original/18/private/iran.jpg)

Iran’s oil industry has been under sanctions since Donald Trump’s first term. Since then, Iran has seen its pool of buyers shrink to leave only China—but China has been a big enough buyer to not only keep Iran’s oil industry afloat, but help it grow, at least in terms of production. In terms of revenues, perhaps not
